entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 12
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 11
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 5 ABOVE
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS 15 TO 20
LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT
